snippet: The televised scenes of triumphant Iraqi troops appeared to confirm reports that Islamic State militants had been driven from the Baiji refinery in northern Iraq.
abstract: Iraqi state television displays images of triumphant soldiers inside the Baiji refinery, first confirmation of reports that government forces have broken siege by Islamic State militants; victory by government is most significant one since June in effort to roll back incursion by the extremists.
lead_paragraph: The televised scenes of triumphant Iraqi troops appeared to confirm reports that Islamic State militants had been driven from the Baiji refinery in northern Iraq.

headline.main: Iraqi Troops Seen Inside Besieged Oil Refinery
headline.print_headline: Iraq: Evidence of Victory at Refinery

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
